name: Panda Media
description:
Founded in 2008 and based in the heart of Yorkshire, we’re an agency passionate about film. We don’t make video by numbers, we listen to your requirements and find out what it is you want to say, who you need to engage with, then provide a concept that will enable you to do that in the most cost effective way possible. That’s why our existing clients come back for more projects. They see the value in our knowledge and service.
All our services are in house, you deal with the people who are actually creating your film. Your producer is always on hand to discuss the project and keep you up to date with progress. We take the hassle out of production, ensuring you get the right results, on time and within the budgets agreed. If you’ve come to our site looking for a hard working, honest video production company, that can devise truly original concepts, and work around the clock to deliver them in the most enthusiastic and creative way possible, then you’ve come to the right place.
